column29: Protocols: In three biological repeat experiments, root tips representing the root meristems (<3 mm) were harvested with a scalpel. Pend:bZIP29-SRDX line 1 and corresponding out-segregated WT line 1 plants were grown for 5 DAS on nylon meshes (Prosep), placed on vertical 1â2 MS medium-containing plates. Total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy Plant mini kit (Qiagen) and treated with RQ1 RNase-Free DNase I (Promega). TruSeq RNA-seq
